Articles.Content:
Hi.

Since Squad is too busy to answer this bug https://bugs.kerbalspaceprogram.com/issues/17984 I have a question.

Which controllers are actually working with KSP and how did you manage to make them work? (no additional software, virtual joystick, afbw, etc). Let us make a list.

I'll start.

Not working:

Sven Aggressor

Stock?  None.  Joystick support is currently completely broken on Linux.  Has been for... awhile.

I have not heard of any that do actually work since 1.3.1.

Unfortunately the only option for us currently is AFBW.
